Html: This can't be done. Why would you create an object and call it the same as a Microsoft object? Now I can't reference Excel and Excel Data Reader because it too is called Excel! I need to be able to read an excel file with the Data Reader and return datatables then I need to later create an excel file in a specific format from which I need Excel and not a reader to perform this action. Can't be done because can't reference both objects in the same project. How would you do this?
Just download the code, change the namespaces to whatever you want (i.e. "ExcelReader"), compile it, use it and be happy :)
